Brian Cathcart on what this mean( h/t Jack Shafer ): The phone hacking scandal has entered a new phase and a number of very powerful people, up to and including David Cameron and Rupert Murdoch , should now be very worried. Glenn Mulcaire 's reported confirmation that a senior News of the World news editor, Ian Edmonson, commissioned him to hack phones elevates a nagging problem into a national political crisis.
